mapper.select: SELECT DATE(dr.recorded_at) AS date, COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(df.serve_count, 0) * COALESCE(f.carbohydrate, 0)), 0) AS carbs, COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(df.serve_count, 0) * COALESCE(f.protein, 0)), 0) AS protein, COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(df.serve_count, 0) * COALESCE(f.fat, 0)), 0) AS fat, COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(df.serve_count, 0) * COALESCE(f.calories, 0)), 0) AS calories FROM diet_records dr LEFT JOIN diet_foods df ON dr.id = df.diet_id LEFT JOIN foods f ON df.food_id = f.id WHERE dr.email = #{email} AND DATE(dr.recorded_at) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE(dr.recorded_at)

SELECT DATE(er.recorded_at) AS date, COALESCE(SUM(er.duration_minutes), 0) AS durationMinutes, COALESCE(SUM(er.calories), 0) AS calories FROM exercise_records er WHERE er.email = #{email} AND DATE(er.recorded_at) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE(er.recorded_at)
